data.text: @HamOntComNews @MountainNews Of course. They should never have been mandated to begin with.
@HamOntComNews No. Keep the masks. ALL health officials acknowledge the pandemic is not over, and more surges are to be expected.
@HamOntComNews Yes, he should. Most are triple and double vaccinated. If you feel sick, stay home. If you feel unsafe, wear a mask, but let's let people get back to making their own life choices.
